title: Typographic ideias and sugestions for Frances outheastern (Provence) in july
content:
Dear typophiles!

I'm considering visiting the France southeastern (Provence) for a few days this summer in the last 2 weeks of July.  
I need some typographic spots and sugestions in that area (exibitions/museums/workshops, etc).  
In a search I found [this.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820181528/http:/colophon.pagesperso-orange.fr/accueil_021.htm)

Of course that other sugestions are welcome!

Thanks in advance!  
António
author: afonseca1974
